lemma Riemann_localization: assumes f: "f absolutely_integrable_on {-pi..pi}" and g: "g absolutely_integrable_on {-pi..pi}" and perf: "\<And>x. f(x + 2*pi) = f x" and perg: "\<And>x. g(x + 2*pi) = g x" and "d > 0" and d: "\<And>x. \<bar>x-t\<bar> < d \<Longrightarrow> f x = g x" shows "(\<lambda>n. \<Sum>k\<le>n. Fourier_coefficient f k * trigonometric_set k t) \<longlonglongrightarrow> c \<longleftrightarrow> (\<lambda>n. \<Sum>k\<le>n. Fourier_coefficient g k * trigonometric_set k t) \<longlonglongrightarrow> c"
